articles.author: Mallika Soni
articles.title: Vladimir Putin didn't attend BRICS to avoid arrest over Ukraine war crimes? - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Vladimir Putin will participate via video call after his travel to South Africa was complicated. | World News
articles.content: Russian president Vladimir Putin is notably absent from the BRICS meeting while other world leaders reached Johannesburg in South Africa to attend the three-day summit. The bloc consists of India, Br… [+1705 chars]
